products.title: Campaigns
products.description: Build your audience and invite them to take your surveys. Create and send HTML email invitations with built-in visual email builder.

products.title: CSV Downloads
products.description: Add support to download the responses in a CSV files. Simple and easy way to export your responses to third-party apps.

products.title: NgSurvey Emails
products.description: Send automated thank you emails, response reports, or send survey invitation when purchased a product on WooCommerce.

products.title: Front-end Management
products.description: Monetise surveys as a software-as-service business. Let your front-end users create and manage surveys on their own.

products.title: MaxMind GeoIP Location
products.description: Add user geo location support to your surveys. Capture user country, region and city details.

products.title: NgSurvey reCAPTCHA
products.description: Protect your public surveys from spammers by adding support for Google reCaptcha (hidden, checkbox, I am not a robot).

products.title: NgSurvey Import & Export
products.description: Export your survey to a JSON file and import to another site or use it to duplicate the surveys with one click importer.

products.title: Question Types Bundle
products.description: Get 14 essential premium question types with this bundle. Build full fledged surveys with all required tools.
